item.title: Screen
item.description: Установка Screen и .screenrc sudo apt install screen screen --version >>> Screen version 4.09.00 (GNU) 30-Jan-22 # nano ~/.screenrc # the following two lines give a two-line status, with the current window highlighted hardstatus alwayslastline hardstatus string '%{= kG}[%{G}%H%? %1`%?%{g}][%= %{= kw}%-w%{+b yk} %n*%t%?(%u)%? %{-}%+w %=%{g}][%{B}%m/%d %{W}%C%A%{g}]' # no welcome message startup_message off # keep scrollback n lines defscrollback 500 # 256 colors attrcolor b ".I" termcapinfo xterm 'Co#256:AB=\E[48;5;%dm:AF=\E[38;5;%dm' defbce on # mouse tracking allows to switch region focus by clicking mousetrack on # default windows screen -t App 1 # default shell screen -t Database 2 # default shell screen -t bash 3 bash # bash shell select 0 bind c screen 1 # window numbering starts at 1 not 0 bind 0 select 10 # navigating regions with Ctrl-arrows bindkey "^[[1;5D" focus left bindkey "^[[1;5C" focus right bindkey "^[[1;5A" focus up bindkey "^[[1;5B" focus down Команды Screen Создать сессию с именем screen -S <имя сессии>
